page.title: 04The City of Leicester Show
page.content: The City of Leicester Show is an{ {annual event}every{August Bank {Holiday.}There are many{display stands from the army, air-force and other national organisations, as well as a {dog show}and{showjumping}with many top riders competing. The City of Leicester Show originally began in{1886}as a{flower show}and {gala,}this still continues and includes a{firework display}across the River Soar in Abbey Park. Abbey Park is the site of Leicester's {Abbey ruins.}It is a park about 1 square kilometre in area near the city centre. There is a{pet's corner}and {aviary}as well as a{children's {playground}and{paddling pool.}The park also provides{winter habitat}for many {starlings}and{waterfowl}that breed on the boating lake.
